etomica.modules.crystalviewer

Class LatticeEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.modules.crystalviewer.LatticeEditor

  • public class LatticeEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that produces a panel with controls that permit editing of the structure of a lattice. Permits changing of type primitive and parameters (sizes and angles) for lattice vectors.
